pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Irvine Robustness Assessment for Qualitative Comparative Analysis // Test the robustness of the QCA method, or a user's QCA solutions, to randomness. iaQCA is also packaged with the irQCA function, which provides recommendations for improving QCA solutions to reach typical significance levels. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qualitative_comparative_analysis for more information about QCA.
